summary: SPF-18 is a 2017 American coming-of-age romantic comedy film directed by Alex Israel in his directorial debut. Israel co-wrote the screenplay with Michael Berk. The film stars Carson Meyer, Noah Centineo, Bianca A. Santos, Jackson White, Molly Ringwald and Rosanna Arquette, and is narrated by Goldie Hawn.
cast:
Carson Meyer as Penny Cooper
Noah Centineo as Johnny Sanders Jr.
Bianca A. Santos as Camilla Barnes
Jackson White as Ash Baker
Sean Russel Herman as Steve Galmarini
Rosanna Arquette as Linda Sanders
Molly Ringwald as Faye Cooper
Keanu Reeves as himself
Pamela Anderson as herself
Goldie Hawn as the narrator
